title: Is Everything A Remix?
teaser: Filmmaker Kirby Ferguson says nothing is original and that our most celebrated creators steal ideas — and transform them into something new.
contentencoded:
Part 2 of the TED Radio Hour episode What Is Original?

About Kirby Ferguson's TEDTalk

Filmmaker Kirby Ferguson says nothing is original and that our most celebrated creators steal ideas — and transform them into something new.

About Kirby Ferguson

Kirby Ferguson is a filmmaker known for his four-part web series, Everything Is a Remix. The series focuses on remixing as form of creativity. He's also the creator of the web series is called This Is Not a Conspiracy Theory, which explores how US politics came to be the way they are.
